title: Video Editor - Content Creator
job_overview:
Part-Time Remote Video Editor & Content Creator

We’re looking for a proactive and creative Video Editor & Content Creator to join our team part-time and remotely. If you love editing videos and adding that special touch that makes them stand out, this is the role for you!

? What You’ll Do:

- Edit and refine video content with Adobe Premiere Pro
- Create simple motion graphics and effects using After Effects
- Collaborate with the team to deliver high-quality video content. 
- Take initiative and suggest ideas to improve video output

????? Requirements:

-Fluent in English
-Excellent knowledge of Adobe Premiere Pro
-Good knowledge of After Effects
-Creative, resourceful, and ready to take on new challenges
-Available to work during 9 AM – 5 PM Copenhagen time

? Hiring Test:
 Shortlisted candidates will be asked to complete a short test:
- Cut a short section of a video to create a Reel in 9:16 format
- Add creative subtitles to 1 Reel, following the style we’ll share as an example

???? What We Offer:

- Part-time position: 3 days per week
- Remote work
- $500 USD per month

???? How to Apply:
Please send us your CV and a portfolio with examples of your video editing work. 
We look forward to seeing what you can do!
